q: During an appearance on Jay Leno 's chat show, Justin Bieber was asked if he met any` cool celebrities' at The Golden Globes. He revealed:`` I met Angelina Jolie ...'' I also met Hailee Steinfeld . She's really nice and talented. Jay Leno asked him:`` So what do you think, she kinda cute?'' Justin Bieber replied:`` I think she's cute, yeah. She's young though right?

The beauty of this particular ride is that there is no four foot tall height restriction as is the case with every other amusement theme park in the world. Park CEO Beauregard Thibodeaux LaTruffles stated, Heck we here at da Giggling Gator are not about ta keep a little kiddoe from riding one of our fabuLou Diamond Phillipss rides just because he or she happens ta be shorter than four feet tall. Why hell Dustin Hoffman , Tom Cruise , and Justin Bieber are all shorter than four feet tall and they have all ridden da Thundering Tornado Typhoon several times each. While the Angelina Jolie-Angelina Jolie kids were riding the roller coaster Angelina Jolie was asked by Fauna Goobergarden of The Tinsel Town Times Tribune what she thought about the disparaging remarks that George Clooney had made regarding her children.
